tool_description: Optimizes job posting content for better visibility and candidate attraction by incorporating relevant keywords and improving readability.

job_description_text.description: The original job description text to optimize

target_keywords.description: Keywords to incorporate for better searchability

optimization_focus.description: Primary optimization goal: seo, readability, or engagement

error_messages: Empty job description: Provide valid job description text with at least 100 characters
Insufficient keywords: Provide at least 3 target keywords for optimization
Invalid optimization focus: Use one of [seo, readability, engagement]
Too many keywords: Limit target keywords to 15 maximum to avoid over-optimization
usage: Input the job description text and target keywords. Specify optimization focus if different from default SEO optimization. The tool will return enhanced content with better keyword integration and improved formatting.

optimized_content.description: Enhanced job description with optimized content

keywords_integrated.description: Number of target keywords successfully integrated
